title: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can login successfully using valid username and password

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid username and password
Click the login button
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard
Verify session cookie or token is set

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails and appropriate error is shown with invalid username or password

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username or password
Click the login button
Verify error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials
Verify user remains on login page

title: Logout Successfully Ends Session
description: Verify that logging out successfully terminates the session and redirects to login page

steps.description: Login with valid credentials
Click the logout button/link
Verify user is redirected to login page
Verify session cookie or token is cleared

title: Session Persistence after Page Refresh
description: Verify that after login, the user remains logged in after refreshing or reopening the page

steps.description: Login with valid credentials
Refresh the browser page
Verify user remains logged in and dashboard is displayed

title: Super Admin Access to All Admin Routes
description: Verify that a super admin role can access all administration routes without restrictions

steps.description: Login as super admin user
Navigate to each admin route in the system
Verify access is granted and pages load correctly

title: Regular User Denied Access to Admin Routes
description: Confirm that users without admin roles cannot access admin-only routes and receive proper denied access messages

steps.description: Login as a regular user (non-admin)
Attempt to access admin routes directly via URL
Verify access is denied with appropriate error message or redirect

title: Viewer Role Has Read-Only Access
description: Ensure users with the viewer role can view content but cannot perform write, edit or delete actions

steps.description: Login as user with viewer role
Navigate to various system pages with content
Verify user can view content
Verify that UI controls for create/edit/delete are disabled or not visible
Attempt URL based POST/PUT/DELETE actions if possible
Verify server returns permission denied errors

title: Owner Role Has Full Organization Access
description: Validate that users assigned the owner role can access and perform all functions available within their organization

steps.description: Login as an owner role user
Navigate through organization-level features and settings
Verify owner can create, modify, and delete resources within organization

title: Navigation to Dashboard Succeeds
description: Verify users can navigate to the dashboard page from any given page

steps.description: Login as any valid user
Click dashboard link in navigation menu or sidebar
Verify dashboard page loads correctly

title: Navigation to All Accessible Pages
description: Ensure users can navigate to all pages they have permission to access using the UI

steps.description: Login as a user with specific role
Use sidebar or menu to navigate through all accessible pages
Verify pages load without access errors

title: Sidebar Navigation Functionality
description: Validate that the sidebar navigation menu works correctly and highlights the active page

steps.description: Login to platform
Click different sidebar menu items
Verify the correct page loads
Verify the active menu item is highlighted

title: Breadcrumbs and Navigation Indicators Work
description: Verify that breadcrumbs and navigation indicators update correctly as users navigate through pages

steps.description: Login and navigate through nested pages
Check that breadcrumbs accurately reflect current page path
Verify navigation indicators are intuitive and consistent

title: Unauthorized Access Error Message Display
description: Check that attempting to access unauthorized content/feature shows proper error message to the user

steps.description: Login as regular user
Attempt to access admin-only route via direct URL
Verify that an unauthorized access error message is displayed

title: Protected Routes Redirect to Login for Unauthenticated Users
description: Validate that unauthenticated users visiting protected routes are redirected to login page

steps.description: Open protected route URL in a new browser session without authentication
Verify user is redirected to login page

title: Network Errors Handled Gracefully
description: Simulate network failures and confirm the system displays appropriate error messages and recovers gracefully

steps.description: Login to platform
Simulate network disconnection or server timeout during data fetch
Verify user is shown a network error message
Verify UI provides retry or fallback options

title: Invalid Routes Display Proper Error
description: Verify that navigation to invalid or undefined URLs shows a user-friendly error page or 404 message

steps.description: Enter a non-existent URL path in the address bar
Verify user sees a 404 or 'Page not found' error message
